nodes.text: The Taï were the native sentient species of the planet Taypho.
The Taï were amphibian humanoids, short in stature. They possessed a mixed respiratory system, with both gills and lungs. This enabled them to survive at great depths without technological aid.
They were known to be a friendly, smiling species, with a gentle air about them.
During the Galactic Civil War, the Taï were oppressed by Quantanagor, the Quarren Imperial Governor of Taypho.

The Taï were created by Christophe Debien and Patrick Bousquet for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "La Légende des Cristaux" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 76. They were illustrated by Igor Chevalier and Cyrille Daujean.
